name: tposcsongbeamer
description: Touch Portal Plugin for Songbeamer remote control over OSC

scripts.build-win: pkg --no-bytecode --targets node16-win-x64 . && move tposcsongbeamer.exe base/Win/TPOSCSongbeamer/ && del Installers\TPOSCSongbeamer-Win.tpp && cd base\Win && node ../../bin/tp-packaging-win.js && del TPOSCSongbeamer\tposcsongbeamer.exe
scripts.build-mac: pkg --targets node16-macos-x64 . && move tposcsongbeamer base/Mac/TPOSCSongbeamer/ && del Installers\TPOSCSongbeamer-Mac.tpp && cd base\Mac && node ../../bin/tp-packaging-mac.js && del TPOSCSongbeamer\tposcsongbeamer

author: Stefan Warnat
